  • Method Details

    • register

      User register(User user)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user entity to be registered.
      Returns:
      The registered user entity with any system-generated fields populated.

    • authenticate

      User authenticate(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on their username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      The authenticated user entity if the credentials are valid, otherwise null.

    • updateUser

      User updateUser(User user)
      Updates the details of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      user - The updated user entity.
      Returns:
      The updated user entity with changes reflected.

    • deleteUser

      boolean deleteUser(Long userId)
      Deletes a user based on their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the deletion was successful.

    • findByUsername

      User findByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves a user entity based on their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for.
      Returns:
      The user entity matching the provided username or null if not found.

    • existsByUsername

      boolean existsByUsername(String username)
      Checks if a user exists based on their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check for existence.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if a user with the provided username exists.

    • existsByEmail

      boolean existsByEmail(String email)
      Checks if a user exists based on their email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check for existence.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if a user with the provided email exists.

    • getAllUsers

      List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users registered in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all users or an empty list if no users are found.

    • findById

      User findById(Long userId)
      Fetches a specific user based on their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the desired user.
      Returns:
      The user corresponding to the provided ID or null if not found.
